synopsis.text: Although ninjas are considered a relic of the past, Recca Hanabishi, a high school student and aspiring ninja, is about to discover his true destiny. After a near-fatal accident, Recca is saved by the enigmatic Yanagi, who possesses remarkable healing abilities. When a mysterious woman attacks them, Recca unknowingly unleashes a powerful flame hidden within him, revealing his connection to the legendary Hokage clan. As the last surviving member of this ancient ninja lineage, Recca must now harness his newfound fire abilities to thwart the sinister plans of his half-brother, Kurei. With the help of his friends, Recca embarks on a thrilling journey to protect Yanagi and master the art of ninjutsu in a world where the ancient and modern collide.
